meanings.definition: A substance that acts like a hormone and is produced by the body
meanings.sent1: The autocoid helped regulate my body functions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how autocoids affect our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The autocoid in my body loves to chat with other hormones.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like an autocoid.
meanings.sent5: The autocoid whispered secrets to my cells, guiding them gently.

meanings.definition: A chemical messenger that regulates physiological functions
meanings.sent1: My body relies on autocoids to keep everything in balance.
meanings.sent2: Autocoids play a crucial role in maintaining our health.
meanings.sent3: The autocoid threw a party to celebrate its regulatory powers.
meanings.sent4: Hope is an autocoid that keeps us going through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The autocoid conducted the symphony of my bodily functions with precision.

meanings.definition: A naturally occurring substance that affects nearby cells in the body
meanings.sent1: The autocoid signals nearby cells to take action.
meanings.sent2: Autocoids communicate messages between cells effectively.
meanings.sent3: The autocoid organized a flash mob with the nearby cells.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was an autocoid that spread positivity around him.
meanings.sent5: The autocoid danced gracefully from cell to cell, spreading its influence.
